Package DataAccess

Class AuthtokenDao

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AuthtokenDao
public class AuthtokenDao extends Object
Inserts, queries, updates, and deletes Authtokens

    • create

      public void create(Authtoken authtoken) throws DataAccessException
      Inserts an Authtoken into the Database
      Parameters:
      authtoken - The Authtoken to insert
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • findAuthtokenByUsername

      public String findAuthtokenByUsername(String username) throws DataAccessException
      Gets an Authtoken from the Database by username
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the Authtoken to get
      Returns:
      The Authtoken associated with the username if one exists, else null
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

      public String findUsernameByAuthtoken(String authtoken) throws DataAccessException
      Gets an Authtoken from the Database by username
      Parameters:
      authtoken - The Authtoken associated with the username to get
      Returns:
      The username associated with the Authtoken if one exists, else null
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

    • update

      public void update(Authtoken oldAuthtoken, Authtoken newAuthtoken) throws DataAccessException
      Replaces an Authtoken in the Database with another
      Parameters:
      oldAuthtoken - The Authtoken to be replaced
      newAuthtoken - The Authtoken to replace the old Authtoken
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database

      public void delete(Authtoken authtoken) throws DataAccessException
      Removes an Authtoken from the Database
      Parameters:
      authtoken - The authtoken to remove from the Database

    • deleteAllForUsername

      public void deleteAllForUsername(String username) throws DataAccessException
      Removes all Authtokens for a User by username
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the User whose Authtokens to delete
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception thrown when an error occurs accessing the Database
